### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)

- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0, y=-82.0)
- Stone furnace (position x=41.0, y=-80.0)

- Burner inserter (position x=41.5, y=-78.5)

### Electricity generator at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Offshore pump (position x=106.5, y=-32.5)
- Boiler (position x=111.5, y=-32.0)

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Transport belt (position x=63.5, y=-53.5)
- Transport belt (position x=64.5, y=-53.5)

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before using them.
- Check the status of burner entities to ensure they are not out of fuel.

### Errors when using stone furnaces without ingredients
- Ensure that stone furnaces have ingredients before using them.
- Check the status of stone furnaces to ensure they are not out of ingredients.

### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power source before using them.
- Check the status of steam engines to ensure they are connected.

### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before using them.
- Check the status of pipe groups to ensure they are not empty.

### Errors when using electricity groups without connection to electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are connected to an electric network before using them.
- Check the status of electricity groups to ensure they are plugged in.

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined or invoked by the agent. 
No important variables have been assigned by the agent.
